summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2009 SATURN AURA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE STEERING WHEEL WAS TURNING THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION FROM WHAT THE CONTACT WOULD TURN. IN ADDITION, THE STEERING WHEEL WAS SHAKING VIOLENTLY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND INFORMED NO RECALLS WERE ON THE VEHICLE AND CONTACT ED DAVID STANLEY CHEVROLET DEALER AT  (405) 632-3600 TO DO A DIAGNOSTIC TEST. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 138,500.
